channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report X-2023101105
item.description:
Report X-2023101105

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-17T18:14:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-16
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin and sent to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose cap and failed inner seal on 1 x 6 qt plastic bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in Hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2023101067
item.description:
Report X-2023101067

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-13
  • City: WALLINGFORD
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023101067 SequenceEvent: QA Frankie found package set aside in unload. Label identified as Corrossive so brought to cage to process as it was leaking DescribePack: Leaking internally DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Immediately brought to cage. 2. X-2023101094 SequenceEvent: Package was loaded onto truck but refused by customer; no sign of leakage at that time but taped up well. DescribePack: By time back to hub; pkg displayed significant leaking DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: upon arrival taken off truck and brought to cage and put in yellow bin to process.

item.title: Report X-2023101030
item.description:
Report X-2023101030

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-11
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was placed into a bin. DescribePack: The package due to the cap becoming loose from one of the bottles causing the liquid to leaked out of the package. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: The package wad place into a red hazmat bin to prevent further leakage.

item.description:
Report X-2023100970

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-04
  • City: STRATFORD
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: When driver reached destination, he noticed the hazmat package was leaking, (due to another package being on top) DescribePack: the body of the inner container was punctured allowing the liquid inside to leak DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was put into a hazmat safe bin and takin back to the station

item.title: Report X-2023100868
item.description:
Report X-2023100868

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-05
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Older plastic pail looks to have been dragged long distances causing damage to the bottom of the container. Pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and taken to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Worn/cracked edge around the bottom of a 1 x 50 lb plastic pail. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in bin.

item.title: Report X-2023100860
item.description:
Report X-2023100860

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-05
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The unmarked pkg was tendered to FedEx Ground without proper markings or documentation for a Hazmat pkg. At some point during transit/sortation the pkg was dropped and began to leak. Upon discovery of leaking the pkg was placed in an unlined unauthorized bin and sent to the HMPA for inspection and reporting which revealed the pkg was Undeclared according to Section 14 of the manufacturer's SDS. DescribePack: Paint cans with no clips failed when the unmarked pkg was dropped. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in bin.

item.title: Report X-2023100637
item.description:
Report X-2023100637

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-14T18:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-03
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was dropped causing the top to become crushed allowing liquid to leak. Pkg was placed in a Hazmat bin and sent to the HMPA. DescribePack: Seal around pop-up cap failed due to pkg being dropped. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in bin.
